name: PlantingDefenses
description:
E - change seed

X - interact

Move around with mouse

Credits: 

Artist: Ambiroa

Music: Dmytri Andreyev

Starting tip: Plant 1 or 2 seeds on a TowerPlot and plant other seeds that boost it around the tower. Plants die overtime (towers cant be collected), so be carefull to not waste all of the seeds on towers too quickly.

Find all of the combos and master them to achieve higher scores.
